titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF THE QUESTION - Mr. Menendez demanded that the question be divided in order to act upon the election of the Chaplain as a separate matter. The question was divided.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Passed House without amendment. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Jeffrey J. Trandahl as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James M. Eagen, III as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
